## Datenwrangling
```{r}

invisible(getSymbols("FEDFUNDS", src = "FRED"))
fed_funds <- data.frame(date = index(FEDFUNDS), rate = coredata(FEDFUNDS))

daten <- fed_funds %>%
  mutate(change_rate = FEDFUNDS/lag(FEDFUNDS),
         change_difference = FEDFUNDS - lag(FEDFUNDS))

head(daten)

ggplot(daten,aes(x = date,
                 y = FEDFUNDS))+
  geom_line()+
  theme_economist()
  

```
